title: Polymer Clay Rainbow Necklace
content: Natasha shares a tutorial for making a rainbow necklace from polymer clay with us. It was probably intended for around St. Patrick’s Day when spring is starting to show up in warmer parts of this hemisphere. It’s pretty much the theme of the days here in late spring and early summer. On the prairies, ferocious thunderstorms and absolutely beautiful rainbows are pretty much a regular afternoon occurrence.
